mapper.select: SELECT cm.conversation_id, cm.content AS first_message FROM (SELECT conversation_id, MIN(message_id) AS min_message_id FROM blog_chatgpt_message GROUP BY conversation_id) AS min_messages INNER JOIN blog_chatgpt_message cm ON min_messages.conversation_id = cm.conversation_id AND min_messages.min_message_id = cm.message_id WHERE cm.conversation_id IN (SELECT conversation_id FROM blog_conversation WHERE user_id = #{user_id}) ORDER BY cm.conversation_id DESC;
